title.narrative: Ethiopia Urban Local Government Development Program II

description.narrative: The Program Development Objective (PDO) is to assist the Recipient in enhancing the institutional performance of participating urban local governments in developing and sustaining urban infrastructure and services.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Urban Development, Housing, and Construction

sector.narrative: Services and Housing for the Poor

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Annual Performance Assessment: Schedule 2, Section III.C | Description :MUDHCO carry out or cause to be carriedout, in accordance with the Program Operations Manual, an annual performance assessment (using independent consultants) todeterminewhether the Program ULG has met the DLRs for said EFY, and the disbursement amount. Furnish said assessment, by not laterthan January 31 each year (for the first assessment, not later than June 30 2014 (EFY2006), to IDA. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Annual procurement audit; Schedule 2, Section III.E | Description :MUDHCo carry out under TOR satisfactory toIDA, an annual procurement audit and furnish said audit, along with a satisfactory management response, to IDA not later than sixmonths after the end of the EFY to which the audit relates; and ensure that the findings of the audit are taken into account in theAPA for the EFY to which the audit relates. Annually, beginning in September 2016 | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Financial audits; Schedule 2, Section III.B | Description :The Recipient shall have the Financial Statementsaudited in accordance with the provisions of Section 4.09 (b) of the General Conditions. Each audit of the Financial Statementsshall cover the period of one fiscal year of the Recipient. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Program Action Plan: Schedule 2, Section I.C.5 | Description :The Recipient shall carry out the Action Plan inaccordance with the schedule set out in the said Action Plan in a manner satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Program Operations Manual: Schedule 2, Section I.C. | Description :The Recipient shall carry out the Program inaccordance with the Program Operations Manual; and shall not amend, abrogate or suspend, or permit to be amended, abrogated orsuspended, any provision of the Program Operations Manual, without the prior written agreement of the Association. | Frequency:CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Program Participation Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I.C.3 | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that no ULGis eligible to participate in the Program until the Recipient through MUDHCo has entered into a tripartite Program ParticipationAgreement (“PPA”), acceptable to the Association, with each Program ULG and the Region where the Program ULG is located therein. |Due Date :07-Jul-2014

Finance Agreement :Value for money audit: Schedule 2, Section III.D | Description :MUDHCo shall carry out , a value for money auditof the Program activities implemented by ULGs in the preceding EFY and furnish said audit, as a part of the APA, to IDA not laterthan six months after the end of the EFY to which the audit relates; and ensure that the findings of the audit are taken intoaccount in the APA for the EFY to which the audit relates. Starting September 2015. | Frequency :Yearly
